channel.title: Help me! please
channel.description:
All I've ever wanted is my own private server that other people can play, but everytime i get a blank client source i get completely lost.. how do I set my ip to the clients once i download the source.. I got my source from www.runelocus.com/ called boxingscape client. I really need help if you know how to make it so i can play on my server and have other people join it aswell and possibly even code for me since I'm clearly stupid when it comes to this stuff. once again please help
Thanks, Jake
